clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Boceprevir when used in combination with DB00811 DB00008 and DB00022 is indicated for use in the treatment of chronic HCV genotype 1 infection in adults FDA Label

contraindications.disease: The most commonly reported adverse reactions in adult subjects were fatigue anemia nausea headache and dysgeusia when Boceprevir was used in combination with DB00811 and DB00008 DB00022 FDA Label
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Boceprevir is classified as a direct acting antiviral DAA and prevents viral replication in HCV genotype 1 FDA Label
